from seascapes and landscapes to still-lives and florals , an inspiring assortment of step-by-step projects provided by professional watercolourists .从海景画和山水画到长生植物和花草，你会发现由专业的艺术家提供的经过严格筛选的一步一步渐进式表现的很有创意的类别。

entry.def: A seascape is a painting or photograph of a scene at sea.
